Documentation.short_help: TTK plugin that takes an input ensemble data set (represented by a list of scalar fields) and which computes various vertexwise statistics (PDF estimation, bounds, moments, etc.).

SourceProxy.Documentation:
TTK plugin that takes an input ensemble data set (represented by a list of scalar fields) and which computes various vertexwise statistics (PDF estimation, bounds, moments, etc.).
See also MandatoryCriticalPoints.

IntVectorProperty.name: Critical pairs
IntVectorProperty.label: Critical pairs used for the clustering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Value of the parameter p for the Wp (p-th Wasserstein) distance computation (type "inf" for the Bottleneck distance).

StringVectorProperty.name: n
StringVectorProperty.label: p parameter
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Value of the parameter p for the Wp (p-th Wasserstein) distance computation (type "inf" for the Bottleneck distance).

IntVectorProperty.name: Deterministic
IntVectorProperty.label: Kill randomness
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: For a deterministic algorithm. Kill any randomness in the initialization of barycenters.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseProgressive
IntVectorProperty.label: Compute Progressive Barycenter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If set to true, the barycenter is computed progressively (starting with most persistent pairs). The option may turn useful coupled with Time Limit since the Barycenter will be computed with only a portion of the input points if computation time gets too important.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeLimit
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Maximal computation time (s)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximal time of computation for the computation of the barycenter. Since Min/Saddle, Saddle/Saddle and Saddle/Max pairs are treated separatly, the actual computation time could be three times the decided limit. A low value of Time Limit will yield approximate results. Use with caution.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAccelerated
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Accelerated KMeans
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Whether or not to use the triangular inequality too fasten the computation of the clustering. If activated, the option saves time. However it may lead to slightly inaccurate classification due to the approximations made during the computation of distance.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseKmeansppInit
IntVectorProperty.label: KMeanspp Initialization
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If activated, the clustering is initialized cleverly. The option may avoid local minima at the cost of some initial computations proportionnal to the product of the number of clusters and the number of diagrams.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Alpha
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Diagram blending
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Blending coefficient for the cost evaluation of each critical point matching. By default (1), only distances in the persistence diagrams are considered between matched critical points. When set to 0, only distances in the original 3D domain are considered between matched critical points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Lambda
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Extremas weight in blending
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Parametrizes the point used for the geometrical coordinates of the persistence pair. Set to 1 to choose the potential extremum, for an increased stability. Set to 0 to choose the other point (saddle point). Not advised, awful stability. Set to 0.5 to choose the geometrical middle of the pair points (bad stability)

IntVectorProperty.name: Output matchings
IntVectorProperty.label: Display the matchings with line segments
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Display the matching between pairs of the persistence diagrams with line segments in 3D.
